attributes.action: Have a disabled centre or sports centre in every borough for disabled children to attend, to meet new friends and to get exersise and enjoy themeselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to have a centre for sports for every borough in the UK for disabled people as I feel it would bring happiness, friends and exercise to young peoples lives. It would be a chance to have fun and enjoy themeselves, they could also join a league and play other centres at sports.
